name: Legend of Jim
description:
You are Jim. Jim is dying. 

Jim discovered he can live longer by killing others.

Jim must survive.

BUTTONS:

ATTACK: O

MOVE: A/D

JUMP: SPACE

ENTER DOORS: W

RESTART LEVEL: R

MAIN MENU: M

Special thanks to:

David Huntting - Music

RumblyChair4407 - Sound and Level design

Uni-verse - Sandbox design

Thomas. - Story and Concepts

Sam Morrison - Character art

I will hopefully keep updating this game as I find the concept intriguing and the movement very satisfying

This is the first game that I have ever made. I've tried unity, but it never clicked. i started using Godot a few days before the jam and just look at what I've managed to do with so little time.
